title: Vendix Beauty Salon
summary: Inherited a baton-dropped project with only an approved portfolio document; rebuilt full scope, requirements, and workflows for salon, client, and marketplace modules. Delivered a fully functional, approved platform aligned with product owner expectations.
outcomes: Full project revival and completion after handover
Three integrated modules — Salon Owner, Client, and Marketplace — successfully launched
All deliverables approved by Product Owner within timeline
achievements: Re-created all project documentation and backlog from scratch
Client satisfaction achieved with zero rollback requests
difficulties: No existing documentation or project continuity from previous PM
Reconstructing requirements from limited client feedback
Balancing technical rework with stakeholder trust recovery
lessons_learned: Always maintain traceable project documentation and backups
Reassess assumptions — never rely on inherited artifacts blindly

title: Employee Management
summary: SaaS HR platform covering onboarding, roles/shifts, payroll, and compliance; combined waterfall planning with iterative delivery ceremonies.
outcomes: Reduced HR admin overhead; improved engagement
Scalable, intuitive platform meeting compliance needs
achievements: Delivered core HR workflows with high adoption
Established change control and RAG tracking
lessons_learned: Hybrid is ideal for regulated SaaS domains

title: Scam Soldier
summary: Community reviews & scam reporting; prioritized authentication, moderation, fraud detection with iterative delivery and stakeholder updates.
outcomes: Launched a platform to enable safer online decisions
achievements: Rapid iteration on core trust & safety features
Stakeholder alignment via demos and updates
difficulties: Fraud signal tuning and false positives
lessons_learned: Iterate fraud models with real-world data

title: Travel Stay Directory
summary: Company-owned travel platform: listing search, filtering, and booking workflow; drove roadmap, backlog, sprints, and stakeholder demos with CEO.
outcomes: Functional prototype with core listing/search features
Prioritized backlog aligned to business value
Transparent progress via sprint reviews and metrics
achievements: Established scalable architecture for future expansion
Maintained clear CEO communication and demos
difficulties: Balancing scope vs. timeline for launch readiness
lessons_learned: Define API integration risks early with fallbacks
Keep MVP scope tight and value-driven
Use burndown/velocity to negotiate scope change

title: Hona AI
summary: Healthcare messaging platform integrating Gmail/Yahoo/Apple Mail with OAuth 2.0; managed compliance, cadence, and Slack-based stakeholder updates.
achievements: Kept cadence with clear acceptance criteria
difficulties: OAuth token handling and API rate limits
lessons_learned: Proactively monitor API quotas and throttling
Use iteration gates for security validation

title: Maguey Exchange
summary: Bilingual platform for agave producers/importers with onboarding, lot tracking, certificate uploads, and brand-aligned UX; guided roadmap and UAT.
outcomes: Resolved photo upload and lot-ID flow issues
difficulties: Edge cases in photo handling on mobile
Balancing fixed brand elements with agility
lessons_learned: Validate bilingual UX early with prototypes
Separate brand constraints from iterative backlog
